columns.Program_ID: A unique identifier assigned to each program in the database.
columns.Name: The title of the program.
columns.Origin: The geographical location where the program originated.
columns.Launch: The year when the program was first launched.
columns.Owner: The organization or entity responsible for producing and distributing the program.

program.table_description: The 'program' table contains details about television programs including their unique identifiers, titles, origins, launch years, and owning organizations.

columns.Channel_ID: A unique identifier for each channel in the database.
columns.Name: The name of the television channel.
columns.Owner: The organization or entity that owns the channel.
columns.Share_in_percent: The percentage of the market share represented by the channel.
columns.Rating_in_percent: The percentage rating that reflects the channel's popularity or viewership.

channel.table_description: The channel table contains detailed information about television channels, including their identifiers, names, ownership, market share percentages, and viewership ratings.

columns.Channel_ID: Identifies the channel broadcasting the program.
columns.Program_ID: Identifies the specific program being broadcast.
columns.Time_of_day: Indicates the time of day when the program is being aired.

broadcast.table_description: The broadcast table captures the relationship between channels and programs, detailing when each program is aired throughout the day.

columns.Channel_ID: Identifies the television channel broadcasting the program.
columns.Program_ID: Identifies the specific program being broadcasted.
columns.Date: Specifies the date on which the program was aired.
columns.Share_in_percent: Represents the percentage of viewers who watched the program on the specified channel.

broadcast_share.table_description: The broadcast_share table records the viewer share statistics for various television programs, detailing the channel, program, date of broadcast, and the share percentage viewers allocated to each program.
